Exercise.Name: Squat
Exercise.Description: Feet should be shoulder-width apart. Go down into squat and come back up.

Exercise.Name: Dead Lift
Exercise.Description: Hold weight in front of thighs. Bend at the waist so that back is parallel to the ground.

Exercise.Name: Reverse Lunge
Exercise.Description: Hold weight at sides. Step back into lunge so that legs form a 0-degree angle. Do sets one leg at a time.

Exercise.Name: Calf Raises
Exercise.Description: Hold weight at sides with feet should width apart with toes on a step and heels hanging onto floor. Lift up on toes.

Exercise.Name: Side Lunge
Exercise.Description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Take a wide step to one side. When outside foot contacts the ground, lower body by pushing hip back and bending the knee.

Exercise.Name: Seated One-Legged Toe Raise
Exercise.Description: Sit down on the bench, place the front of one of the feet on a step and hold a dumbbell with both hands on top of that foot’s thighs. Raise the dumbbell by standing on toes.
